messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
I go everywhere with my NOCTOWL.
We’re gonna show you owl best! Ha!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
We did our best. That’s what
matters. Right?
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Even on cold days, just being with
my NOCTOWL keeps me warm!
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
I curled up inside my NOCTOWL’s wings
and waited for you to return!
